job_desc_short: Join our team as a Python Developer to create high-quality, maintainable code and collaborate on innovative solutions. Passion for technology and strong problem-solving skills required.
job_desc: We are seeking a talented and motivated Python Developer to join our dynamic team. As a Python Developer, you will be responsible for writing efficient, maintainable, and reusable code to develop high-quality applications. You will work closely with other developers, designers, and product managers to bring innovative solutions to complex problems. If you have a passion for technology, a strong problem-solving mindset, and a deep understanding of Python, we would love to meet you.
responsibilities: Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code
Stay updated with the latest industry trends and technologies to continuously improve skills and knowledge
requirements: Min 4 years experience working as a backend developer
Experience on developing robust backend applications
Proven experience as a Python Developer or similar role.
Experience with popular Python frameworks (e.g., Django, Flask, FastAPI)
Knowledge of SQL and database technologies (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL).
preferred_qualifications: Experience with cloud platforms (e.g., AWS, Azure, Google Cloud)
Knowledge of containerization technologies (e.g., Docker, Kubernetes)
Understanding of machine learning libraries and frameworks (e.g., TensorFlow, PyTorch) is a plus.
benefits: Flexible working hours and remote work options
Professional development opportunities and learning budget
Collaborative and inclusive work environment
